name: Let's Get Happy Ending Project Chapter 1 Yume NIkki Time to Wake Up
name_original: Let's Get Happy Ending Project Chapter 1 Yume NIkki Time to Wake Up
description: This is the first chapter of mostly indie games project, help to Madotsuki from Yume Nikki avoid her "canon" end, in this game you will meet most notable Yume Nikki Characters like Mono Sisters, Masada-sensei, Poniko and etc, there is planned six chapters of LGHEP, and probably seventh final, but later, in this and following chapters you can get three different endings, Bad, Normal and True, so if you don't like "canon" endings in games like Yume Nikki, Witch's House, Limbo, .Flow, Mad Father and Inside join to this journey and help to heroes reach their HAPPY END.
